jobDescription: Jenny Jones is a busy Financial Manager looking for a part-time personal assistant to work out of her home office four days per week for a total of 8-15 hours. Hours are flexible and may vary depending on the volume of work to be done.Responsibilities include checking email and managing family calendar, scheduling appointments, filling prescriptions, sending reminders, submitting insurance claims, and taking lead on in-home projects.We are looking for a highly intelligent, proactive, organized, sensitive, patient, and creative person with exceptional problem solving and communication skills.Preference for applicants with great computer skills who have graduated from a top college. At least one year of personal assistant experience required.Please respond with a resume and cover letter describing your qualifications and interest in the position. Thank you!
